detail_desc: Cheeky, bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waistband made of two wide elastic straps. Wide sides and a high cut at the back.
Suede boots with pointed toes, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Leather linings and twill insoles. Heel approx. 4.5 cm.
Mules in shimmering imitation leather with pointed toes. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Cropped top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Socks in a rib-knit cotton blend with elastication at the top.

Short checked shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed, adjustable belt with a metal fastener and a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets and short slits in the sides of the hems.

Cold shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with a small frill trim, drawstring at the top and button at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, short, flounced sleeves and a knot detail at the hem. Slight shorter front and elastication at the back of the hem.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional yarn with ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet. The polyester content of the socks is recycled.
Fitted jacket with jetted front pockets and no fasteners. Lined.
Wide cotton jersey T-shirt with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline.
Fully lined triangle bikini top with double shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjama shorts in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a racer back and rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed turtle neck, long sleeves and a flared skirt.
Joggers in airy, lightweight jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.

Set with a T-shirt and matching joggers in soft fabric. Classic T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric in a casual style and relaxed fit. Easy pull-on waist with covered elastication and a drawstring. Pockets in the side seams, one back pocket, a low crotch and tapered legs with a print motif on one leg and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Straight-cut blouse in a softly draping silk and viscose weave with an opening and buttons at the back of the neck and yoke with a pleat. Long sleeves with wide buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Hat in a soft rib knit.
Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey with a flounced trim over the shoulders and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves, a V-neck and gathers at the front for a draping effect.

Shirt in premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave with an inset lace trim down the front. Narrow cut with gathers at the top, short, narrow shoulder straps and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam with a flounce at the hem.
Long-sleeved tops in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric, one with an all-over print. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a straight-cut hem.
Small backpack with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Size 11x21x26 cm.
V-neck top in airy jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a foldover shaft. (Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.) The socks are made partly from organic cotton.
Short skirt in imitation suede and imitation leather with decorative zips at the front and a visible zip at the back. Lined.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey in a straight cut at the top with shoulder straps and an asymmetric flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Body in microfibre and lace with a push-up bra. Underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs and a high cut at the back.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slightly wider legs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with gathered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a high ribbed shaft with an intarsia motif and elastication at the top.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
Satin tie. Width 6.5 cm.
Hat in a soft knit with a roll-edge hem.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a collar that has points at the back, and a concealed button and zip at the back of the neck.

Batik-patterned surf suit in UV-protective fabric with a stand-up collar, zip with a zip guard at the back and 3/4-length raglan sleeves. Short legs and a lined gusset. UPF50. The polyester content of the surf suit is recycled.
Fitted vest top in organic cotton jersey with spaghetti straps and a narrow lace trim at the top.
Fine-knit trainer socks with an embroidered motif and elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.

Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Unlined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
T-shirt in printed jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Boots in imitation leather with a tab and metal buckle on the shaft, lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Soft velour linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit mohair blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Embroidery on the front and sleeves.
Leggings in washed, superstretch denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
Trousers in stretch, supersoft cotton twill. Adjustable, elasticated waist with a press-stud, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in a cotton and silk blend with seams front and back.
Metal earrings in various designs. Sizes from 0.8 cm to 4 cm.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.

Lined, non-wired, triangle bikini top with a wide hem. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Round metal earrings shaped like a spider’s web. Diameter 5.5 cm.
Fine-knit knee socks in a soft cotton blend with a high shaft that ends at the knee.
Shirt in a patterned Oxford cotton weave with a chest pocket, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Detachable bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, lacing at the front and a short shaft and tongue in scuba fabric. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles in ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and rubber.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with side pockets, fake welt back pockets and gently tapered legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for the best fit over the tummy.
Long-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with a round neckline, dropped shoulder seams and a gathered seam at the hem.
Hair elastics in various designs without metal clips. Two with a glittery appliqué.
Lace shortie briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Set with three ear cuffs, three non-matching earrings and two hoop earrings that can be worn as a pair. Size from 0.2 cm to 2.5 cm.
Short-sleeved leotard in soft jersey with a tulle skirt and sleeves, and press-studs at the crotch.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with an unlined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.

Trousers in lightweight cotton denim with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, fake side pockets and fake leg pockets with a decorative flap. Fake fly and legs that can be rolled up and secured with a tab and button.
Short-sleeved tops in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a round, scallop-trimmed neckline.
Narrow, braided belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 1.5 cm.
High-waisted shorts in a patterned viscose weave with a sheen. Pleats at the top, a concealed zip at the back, side pockets and short, wide legs.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist and skinny legs.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft organic cotton velour. Top with long raglan sleeves, buttons on one shoulder at the back and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and narrow ribbed hems.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Short dungaree dress in sturdy washed cotton denim with wide straps that taper at the back and fasten with a button. Zip fly and button, side pockets, patch front pockets with a flap and fake flap pockets at the back.
Wide, round-neck jumper in a sturdy weave with balloon sleeves and narrow cuffs. Gently tailored with a slight flare to the hem.
Hairbands in elasticated cotton jersey.
Belt in braided imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
